name: TechGFT
descript: Process Technology based Green's Function Table generator.

name: RWCap-solver Homogemizated
descript: A temporarry branch of rwcap (will be merged in the future). It implements the FRW algorithm with the dielectric homogenization method. The maximul cube transition domain is used in every hop and the dielectric layers contained by the cube are approximated as four equal-thickness layers.

name: Homogemizated Tables
descript: Table files use by rwcap homogemizated version
